name: Star Turtle vs. the Galactic Empire
name_original: Star Turtle vs. the Galactic Empire
description:
My first video game, made for /agdg/'s SpaceJam.

Play as a turtle who bears no relation to a flying, spinning kaiju starring in various Japanese films, destroy space ships and bounce off of force fields!

Full version under development for the Atari Jaguar and rotary phones.
